      • getSquare

        Square getSquare​(int row,
                 int col)
        Gets a square given its coordinates
        Parameters:
        row - is the row's value, first is 0
        col - is the column's value, first is 0
        Returns:
        the square placed in specified coordinates

        Parameters:

        dir - is the direction detected
        Returns:

      • getVisibleSquares

        java.util.List<Square> getVisibleSquares​(Square position,
                                         int maxRange,
                                         int minRange,
                                         boolean onlyWithPlayer)
        Gets visible squares
        Parameters:
        position - starting position
        maxRange - maximum distance of returned squares
        minRange - minimum distance of returned squares
        onlyWithPlayer - excluded squares where there are no players
        Returns:
        give the list of visible squares according to input parameters

      • getCardinalDirectionSquares

        public java.util.List<Square> getCardinalDirectionSquares​(Square position,
                                                          int maxRange,
                                                          int minRange,
                                                          boolean ignoreWalls)
        Gets squares only in the four CardinalDirection
        Parameters:
        position - is the position from where get straight direction squares
        maxRange - maximum distance of gotten squares
        minRange - minimum distance of gotten squares
        ignoreWalls - specify if ignore or consider walls
        Returns:
        List of squares in the 4 basic cardinal directions (diagonal squares are not returned)

      • getPlayersOnCardinalDirectionSquares

        java.util.List<Player> getPlayersOnCardinalDirectionSquares​(Player shooter,
                                                            int maxRange,
                                                            int minRange,
                                                            boolean ignoreWalls)
        Gets players on squares only in the four CardinalDirection
        Parameters:
        shooter - Player that is searching for other player (his position is used to get the other players)
        maxRange - maximum distance of gotten squares
        minRange - minimum distance of gotten squares
        ignoreWalls - specify if ignore or consider walls
        Returns:
        List of players on squares in the 4 basic cardinal directions (diagonal squares are not returned)

      • getStraightSquares

        private void getStraightSquares​(java.util.List<Square> list,
                                Square position,
                                int maxRange,
                                boolean ignoreWalls,
                                CardinalDirection dir)
        Gets straight squares on list
        Parameters:
        list - is a list passed by caller, needed to allow recursion
        position - is the position from where get straight direction squares
        maxRange - maximum distance of got squares
        ignoreWalls - specify if ignore or consider walls
        dir - is the direction in which get squares

      • getReachableSquare

        java.util.List<Square> getReachableSquare​(Square position,
                                          int maxMoves)
        Gets reachable squares
        Parameters:
        position - starting position
        maxMoves - number of steps allowed
        Returns:
        the list of squares reachable in at most maxMoves steps

                                                           int maxMoves,
                                                           Player player)
        Gets reachable squares that have at least another player on
        Parameters:
        position - starting position
        maxMoves - max distance of the squares
        player - player to exclude
        Returns:
        the list of squares reachable in at most maxMoves steps with at least another player on

      • getThirdSquareInTheSameDirection

        Square getThirdSquareInTheSameDirection​(Square firstSquare,
                                        Square secondSquare,
                                        boolean ignoreWall)
        This method returns the square adjacent to the second square reachable in the same direction ( first square must be on the same column or the same row of second square)
        Parameters:
        firstSquare - FirstSquare
        secondSquare - Second Square
        ignoreWall - true to ignore walls
        Returns:
        Square adjacent to the second square in the same direction

      • getPlayersInTheSameDirection

        java.util.List<Player> getPlayersInTheSameDirection​(Player shooter,
                                                    java.util.List<Player> targetPlayersToExclude,
                                                    int maxTargetDistance,
                                                    int minTargetDistance,
                                                    boolean ignoreWalls)
        This method returns all other players in the same direction (based on shooter position and on targetPlayersToExclude players position)
        Parameters:
        shooter - Player who's searching for other players
        targetPlayersToExclude - list of players to exclude
        maxTargetDistance - max targets distance
        minTargetDistance - min targets distance
        ignoreWalls - if true walls are ignored
        Returns:
        List of the players

      • getCardinalDirection

        private CardinalDirection getCardinalDirection​(Square origin,
                                               Square target)

      • getSquaresInADirection

        private java.util.List<Square> getSquaresInADirection​(Square origin,
                                                      CardinalDirection direction,
                                                      int maxTargetDistance,
                                                      int minTargetDistance,
                                                      boolean ignoreWalls)
        Gets squares in a direction starting from Origin
        Parameters:
        origin - Current square
        direction - Direction of a target square from the Origin (ex. square 2.2 is WEST from 2.3)
        maxTargetDistance - max distance of a square from origin
        minTargetDistance - min distance of a square from origin
        ignoreWalls - true if walls must be ignored
        Returns:
        squares in the direction specified starting from Origin

      • getSquareInOtherVisibleRooms

        java.util.List<Square> getSquareInOtherVisibleRooms​(Square position)
        This method returns squares at distance 1 accessible through doors.
        Parameters:
        position - Current position
        Returns:
        List of squares ( a square for each room )

        public java.util.List<Square> getSquareList()
